title: Porsche IMSA GT3 Cup Challenge by Yokohama - Races 10 & 11, Road America 2012
description: The Porsche IMSA GT3 Cup Challenge by Yokohama features drivers racing in the largest single-make series in North America. Powered by one of the world's most successful race cars, the Porsche 911 GT3 Cup Type 997, the multi-class structure of this series teaches drivers essential skills for a career in the American Le Mans Series. The 2012 GT3 Cup races at the 4 mile Elkhart Lake road course challenge the Platinum and Gold class racers like no other track can.

asset.title: Porsche IMSA GT3 Cup Challenge by Yokohama - Races 10 & 11, Road America 2012

The race prior - Rounds 8 & 9, Mosport 2012

Next Races -
September 14-15 at Virginia International Raceway with ALMS Round 9
October 19-20 at Road Atlanta with ALMS Petit Le Mans finale
